short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes everything to Comic Sans for no reason

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of websites using multiple and confusing fonts? With the Comic Sans-ifer 3000 you can finally browse the web all with one unified font! Google, Facebook, and even email will all be written in the beautiful and poetic font of Comic Sans. Great of easy reading, or just to mess with your friends!
